Generation VII.Sun: It destroyed its own control mask. It has become capable of changing its type by equipping special memories.
Generation VII.Moon: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories , this Pokémon can adapt its type to confound its enemies.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Having been awakened successfully, it can change its type and battle—just like a certain Pokémon depicted in legends .
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Its capacity to change types unleashed, it shines silver due to the energy springing forth from within.

Generation VIII.Sword: Thanks to its awakened powers, it can change to the <Type> type to match the memory it has equipped.
Generation VIII.Shield: It has the ability to change its type based on the memory it's holding. This is its <Type> -type form.
